title: VR-Based Remote Science Education Strategy Design: Applying Focus Group Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science concepts and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Providing VR-based science lab simulations in the post-COVID-19 non-face-to-face education expansion environment. Learners can access virtual labs through digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform three or more advanced scientific experimental procedures via VR simulation.
Learners can achieve over 80% mastery of learning content by utilizing OER (Open Educational Resources).

Based on feedback collected from three or more focus group discussions (five items: communication, task distribution, problem-solving), learners achieve 4+ points (5-point scale) in three or more of four remote collaboration competency rubric items.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
